title: On February 20, 2010 a VIC-20 tweeted
content:
Fifteen years ago, Twitter was still relevant. And nobody had ever tweeted from a Commodore VIC-20, the best selling computer of 1982, before. Syd Bolton, the curator of the Canadian Personal Computer Museum, decided to fix that. And on February

The post On February 20, 2010 a VIC-20 tweeted appeared first on The Silicon Underground.
